h2.font: April 22nd Video Message from Superintendent Tucker

div.font:
If you need Tech Support for your 1:1 device, you can leave a message at 524-3350 Ext. 4688
Or email helpdesk@laconiaschools.org which will create a ticket.
Please include: student name, phone number to reach them, and a description of the problem.

img.style: margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 10px; border-width:1px;padding:3px; max-width:100%

span.style: display: table-caption; caption-side: bottom; font-size: 90%; margin-top: -10px; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

font.font: Students/Parents, if you are having a problem with your school device you can:
leave a meesage for the Helpdesk at 524-3350 ext 4688

font.em: Please include: your name, student's name, phone number & a description of the problem.

span.font: Please keep in mind that all systems on the internet are being pushed to their maximum capacity which may cause slow downs on the user end.

font.a: ​Grab and Go Meal Distribution Bus Routes Starting April 6, 2020

a.font:
Age-appropriate safety procedure training for the students in our schools ​
​ALICE
